    • getFamilyEventPosteriors

      public double[] getFamilyEventPosteriors​(int node)
      Posterior probabilities for family-level events on the edge leading to a node. The probabilities are calculated by subtractions using complementary events, but rounded to 0.0 if negative bc precision.
      Parameters:
      node -
      Returns:
      4-element array indexed in Posteriors.FamilyEvent order

    • computeAncestorPosteriors

      private double[] computeAncestorPosteriors​(double[] outsideLL, double[] insideLL, double extinct)
      Parameters:
      outsideLL - outside ancestor log-likelihoods
      insideLL - inside log-likelihoods
      extinct - extinction probability
      Returns:
      minimum 2-member array

    • computeNode

      private double[] computeNode​(int node)
      Algorithm for computing the outside log-likelihood at a node. The profile must not be ambiguous at the root.
      Parameters:
      node - called in preorder, after setting edge outer likelihood here, and node outer at the parent
      Returns:
